pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
